episodes.title: What is Religious Trauma Syndrome?
episodes.description:
Today I ask Janice What is Religious Trauma Syndrome.

Janice Selbie is a Registered Professional Counsellor and religious trauma recovery consultant. She grew up Pentecostal and became increasingly fundamentalist while married and homeschooling her daughters, aligning her beliefs with the Holdeman Mennonites (calling herself Mennocostal).

Near age 40, Janice's family endured several calamities in a short span, causing her to question her deeply held Christian beliefs. Eventually, she divorce her pastor husband and her religion. Feeling like she had exited a cult, Janice returned to school to study psychology and counselling. 

Links for Janice Selbie
www.divorcing-religion.com
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGhyTXTIM9kdTJ1jW-Ckb5g 
www.religioustraumaconference.org
-
